ul.li: For "background-spacing", possible values are length length? | inherit

body.p: If statement above is true, this paragraph should have an initial (0) (default) background spacing for its flag image. The rule applied is "p {background-spacing: ;}". body.h4:
The background-size of this h4 heading should be 1.5in for the nist image vertically, and 0.5in horizontally. The rule applied is "h4 {background-spacing: 0.5in 1.5in;}". Also "h4 {background-image: url(nist.gif)}".

Rule applied is "strong {background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". h4.em: This emphasized text should have a background spacing of inherit for its flag pattern. It is immediately enclosed within an h4 tag, which has the properties indicated above. The rule applied is "em {background-spacing: inherit;}". body.blockquote: This blockquote element should have a background alignment with its initial position for this oval button image, since a negative spacing is specified, which is allowed. Rules specified are "blockquote {background-spacing: -20px; background-image: url(ovalbbut.gif);}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, it may not be long enough to support an image.
